text: {"fixed_xml":"<ITEM>5. Bey Herrn Daniel Eckenstein dem Buchdrucker in der Eschemer-Vorstatt sind folgende Bücher zu haben: <BIBL><AUTHOR>Dr. Johann Rambach</AUTHOR> <TITLE>erbauliches Hand-Büchlein für Kinder</TITLE> in <FORMAT>8v√≤</FORMAT></BIBL>. <BIBL><AUTHOR>Johann Arndt</AUTHOR> <TITLE>sechs Geistreiche Bücher vom wahren Christenthum</TITLE></BIBL>; Item <BIBL><AUTHOR>deßselben</AUTHOR> <TITLE>Geistreiches Paradys-Gärtlein</TITLE> in <FORMAT>8v√≤</FORMAT></BIBL>. <BIBL><AUTHOR>Johann-Hühner</AUTHOR> <TITLE>zweymahl zwey und fünffzig auserlesene Biblische Historien aus dem alten und neuen Testament</TITLE> <FORMAT>8v√≤</FORMAT></BIBL>. <BIBL><TITLE>Der Gnaden-Schlüssel aller Kinderen GOttes</TITLE> in <FORMAT>12mo</FORMAT></BIBL>. <BIBL><TITLE>die Weege und Wercke GOttes in der Seele</TITLE> in <FORMAT>12mo</FORMAT></BIBL>. Item: <BIBL><TITLE>Ubungen sich stets in der Gegenwart GOttes zu halten</TITLE>, <FORMAT>8v√≤</FORMAT></BIBL></ITEM>","number_of_corrections":2,"explanation":"Two corrections were made: 1) The second BIBL element for \"Johann Arndt\" was missing its closing tag </BIBL> before the semicolon and \"Item\" - it incorrectly had a nested BIBL inside it. Added the closing </BIBL> tag after the TITLE element \"sechs Geistreiche Bücher vom wahren Christenthum\". 2) Removed the opening <BIBL> tag that was incorrectly nested inside the Johann Arndt entry, as \"deßselben\" (meaning \"the same [author]\") refers to a separate bibliographic entry and should have its own properly structured BIBL element."}

parsed.fixed_xml: <ITEM>5. Bey Herrn Daniel Eckenstein dem Buchdrucker in der Eschemer-Vorstatt sind folgende Bücher zu haben: <BIBL><AUTHOR>Dr. Johann Rambach</AUTHOR> <TITLE>erbauliches Hand-Büchlein für Kinder</TITLE> in <FORMAT>8v√≤</FORMAT></BIBL>. <BIBL><AUTHOR>Johann Arndt</AUTHOR> <TITLE>sechs Geistreiche Bücher vom wahren Christenthum</TITLE></BIBL>; Item <BIBL><AUTHOR>deßselben</AUTHOR> <TITLE>Geistreiches Paradys-Gärtlein</TITLE> in <FORMAT>8v√≤</FORMAT></BIBL>. <BIBL><AUTHOR>Johann-Hühner</AUTHOR> <TITLE>zweymahl zwey und fünffzig auserlesene Biblische Historien aus dem alten und neuen Testament</TITLE> <FORMAT>8v√≤</FORMAT></BIBL>. <BIBL><TITLE>Der Gnaden-Schlüssel aller Kinderen GOttes</TITLE> in <FORMAT>12mo</FORMAT></BIBL>. <BIBL><TITLE>die Weege und Wercke GOttes in der Seele</TITLE> in <FORMAT>12mo</FORMAT></BIBL>. parsed.explanation: Two corrections were made: 1) The second BIBL element for "Johann Arndt" was missing its closing tag </BIBL> before the semicolon and "Item" - it incorrectly had a nested BIBL inside it. Added the closing </BIBL> tag after the TITLE element "sechs Geistreiche Bücher vom wahren Christenthum". 2) Removed the opening <BIBL> tag that was incorrectly nested inside the Johann Arndt entry, as "deßselben" (meaning "the same [author]") refers to a separate bibliographic entry and should have its own properly structured BIBL element.
